name: Chocolate brown handbag with leather handles 100% woollen felted. It's recycled !
description:
Chunky chocolate cable felted into a warm & cute saucy one of a kind hand bag. Luscious......

This bag was created from a saucy brown men's sweater that I recycled into a soft and hardwearing material by boil washing. I love recycling , so it's been brilliant that I can use some in this bag.

It fastens with a 100% wool fastener and a brown horn toggle and has a cute animal print lining throughout.

The size of the bag is :-

9" (24cm) wide
10" (25cm) tall

It has lovely leather handles which are 19" long from end to end with a 8" drop.

name: Purple / aubergine clutch bag hand knitted in 100% wool in moss stitch, felt lined, bead trim
description:
Small hand knitted purple clutch bag. It has been knitted in 100% wool in my favourite moss stitch which gives it a lovely textual feel. It has an integral handle and 3 small beeded flowers to the front.

The bag is fully lined with purple felt throughout. The felt has been created from a woollen sweater which I boiled wash to create a soft but hardwearing material. I love upcycling so It's brilliant I have managed to incorporate some in this bag.

It has a press stud fastening and is 10" wide x 5.5 " tall with a 1" handle. Please hand wash only.

name: "Knit Knot" bag. Moss green, felt lined. hand knit. Inspired by the Japanese Knot bag
description:
Truly unusual bag ! The bag does not have any fastenings , instead it using a clever knotted technique to keep the bag closed. It has been inspired by the Japanese knot bag.

It has been  hand knitted in Rowan summer tweed yarn with a touch of fancy purple , blue , mustard and gold trimmings and enhancements.

The bag is felt lined using one of my felted recycled jumpers.



The Japanese knot bag is known to be used for carrying balls of wool round for your knitting projects. It will keep the yarn tidy and able to be neatly unravelled whilst you knit away.

But I see this bag as an ideal little nifty accessory that can be used anytime you want to keep your hands free (or not) , whether walking , cycling or wherever.

It's big enough to take make up bag , phone , purse etc , being 22cm wide and 9cm high with a 10cm handle.

Cute little bag.

name: One of a Kind Tangerine orange felted wool shoulder bag. It's been recycled !
description:
A gorgeous one of a kind shoulder bag lovingly hand created from a recycled felted garment. A bright tangerine orange cardigan was boiled washed into a soft and hard wearing fabric which was then handstitched into this unique shoulder bag. 

It features a relief black felted flower encrusted with orange beads in the centre and the stamens.

It is fully lined in cordinating white , black and orange flowery cotton material.

Truly unusual, unique , designed and handmade by me

The size of the bag is:-

17" wide at the widest point
10" high at the highest point
4" depth
